column4: I needed to install a newer version of gstreamer, I downloaded the latest tarball from the gstreamer site. I compiled and installed it. Now there are two copies of gstreamer, one from synaptic, one from the main site, this is causing problems. how do i remove the synaptic one?

I needed to install a newer version of gstreamer, I downloaded the latest tarball from the gstreamer site. I compiled and installed it. Now there are two copies of gstreamer, one from synaptic, one from the main site, this is causing problems. how do i remove the synaptic one?
